metadata.title: CVE-2016-9802 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: In BlueZ 5.42, a buffer over-read was identified in "l2cap_packet" function in "monitor/packet.c" source file. This issue can be triggered by processing a corrupted dump file and will result in btmon crash.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-02-07, appears unfixed crash in hcidump command line tool only

criterions.comment: bluez package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
